entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 09:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight then light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
